textBeforeTable: Employment estimate and mean wage estimates for this occupation: National estimates for this occupation: Top National estimates for this occupation Industry profile for this occupation State profile for this occupation Metropolitan area profile for this occupation Occupational Employment and Wages, May 2004 15-1071 Network and Computer Systems Administrators Install, configure, and support an organization's local area network (LAN), wide area network (WAN), and Internet system or a segment of a network system. Maintain network hardware and software. Monitor network to ensure network availability to all system users and perform necessary maintenance to support network availability. May supervise other network support and client server specialists and plan, coordinate, and implement network security measures. Exclude "Computer Support Specialists" (15-1041).
